title: Oceania Server Skin.
body:
When the OCE server was created it was proposed that we were going to receive a unique skin to represent the server and not just Australia (Pool Party Ziggs). Was just wondering how the skin is coming along and if we could get any updates on it? 
- Cheers.

replies.body:
Pool Party Ziggs was used as bait to make people transfer from NA to OCE, nothing to do with an Aussie skin.

Riot's update about he skin is always the same.

"We have no idea what skin will represent all of Oceania and not just Australia/NZ, so in short, its never coming"
PP ziggs wasn't given to use to represent australia, it was given to use because free %%%% when transferring.

Yes.

URF.

F*ck you if you say otherwise.
-Out.
couldn't they just make a series of skins, one for each oceanic country?
